Params: {3: "Time slows down in the twins' visions. With ease, they approach Asslam, leaping into the air and launching a deadly strike at the fractured carriages once more."}
{3: 'Bodies of flesh and blood fall off the train amidst desperate cries, like scattered paper in the wind.'}
{3: 'Before despair can tear him apart, Watanabe charges into the crowd of Hetero-Creatures, his two blades drawn.'}
{3: 'As the Red Tide threatens to devour everyone, the surviving humans and Constructs all take up arms, unable to stand aside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: 'How many more lives are you going to take?!', 4: '1'}

{3: "Blood and the Red Tide intermingle along the train tracks, drawing a crimson scar across the earth. As thunder roars in the sky, the cacophony of the crowd's cries composes the symphony of the inferno."}
{3: 'Right now, they are still twelve hours away from arriving at City 210.'}
{3: 'People still believe then that hope awaits them ahead.'}
